name: RoketFist
description:
CONTROLS:

-WASD to Move

-Shift to Slowmo

-Click and hold to charge shot then release to shoot

-When Fist is detached, you can guide it with Click

***Slowmo boosts Fist!

Story:

In a world controlled by robots, one man, one rocket powered fist, and a whole lot of robots to explode. 

Rick Ochet traveled back in time to destroy the evil robot regime with the only way he knows how, his fist. Fight through three high intensity levels as you rocket punch robots into pieces to show them how much better humans are. Slow down time to dodge bullets, and build power to your fist.
